LanguageData.Flake.label: flake
LanguageData.Flake.description: A flaky substance that can be smoked to induce a short but powerful euphoric state. While it is cheap to produce, it is exceptionally addictive.
LanguageData.FlakeHigh.label: high on flake
LanguageData.FlakeHigh.stages.0.label: high on flake
